WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr 4.0.17 Released. If this is still an issue in this new version, please reopen the issue per the Posting Guidelines with all of the necessary information.
WorkItem.Description:
Not all Items become available after importing from Rawr Addon.
Â 
Edit: I figured out ALL items that you own twice were not marked as available(green diamond check) in Rawr4 when you import via RawrAddon. I think it is obviously an bug, but I don't know if it is one of the Addon or Rawr4 :)
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] Import does not mark all items available

Comments.Message: Can you save your import into a text file and upload that so that we can see what is going on?
In addition to the upload as Hina requested, can you tell me which items you are thinking should be getting imported and aren't?

i dont know if its all, because im lazy, but i think it happens with all items that you own twice.

I see what's happening. The toggler that sets it as available turns it on, then the second instance of the item turns it back off. I'll have to write in a check to see if it's in a previous list and pull it out.
